entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
